links.*: The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series)

wikitext.*:
'''Victor Platt''' (born '''Victor William Elphick''', [[10 October]] [[1920]] - [[30 January]] [[2017]]) was a British actor. He played various stage roles and made guest appearances on television series. In the [[1955]] radio series ''[[The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series)|The Lord of the Rings]]'', he played [[Samwise Gamgee|Sam]].
